_sText:
SF Hospital from America's Army, layout is almost exactly the same except for the back alley where Ambush used to spawn, which I have gotten rid of due to brush limit and because it would've been pointless.  There are 52 spawn points, the escape zone is where it was in AA(under the garage door at the helipad building)  CTs spawn where VIP spawned in AA(at the back of the hospital), and the Ts spawn where Escort spawned in AA.

*There is also a Hostage Rescue version in the link below*
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/72746

Special thanks to the Tactical Gamers and to Bodazephyr for beta testing.
